definition: daily renewal, monthly change (idiom)/every day sees new developments/rapid progress
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin

sentences.english: These are the keys to keeping up in the fast-paced arena of social networks.
sentences.chinese: 這是在日新月異的社交網絡環境中生存的要義。

sentences.english: Just because of that years of changes with each new, vitality abundant, a riot of color .
sentences.chinese: 只因爲那日新月異，生機盎然，色彩繽紛的歲月。

sentences.english: I mean, we're losing our people skills because of the wonderful technology is there.
sentences.chinese: 我是說，科技的日新月異會使人們逐漸喪失交往技巧。

sentences.english: She has a long history, but also changes everyday.
sentences.chinese: 又有歷史的滄桑感，但是又在日新月異的變化。

sentences.english: World changes with each passing day instead of remaining unchanging.
sentences.chinese: 世界並非萬古不變，而是日新月異。

sentences.english: Nowadays, the world has been changing quickly accompanying with rapid technology development.
sentences.chinese: 今天，世界隨着日新月異的科技發生着迅速的變化。

sentences.english: She has a long history, but has changes everyday.
sentences.chinese: 她又有歷史的滄桑感，但是又在日新月異的變化着。

sentences.english: The development of construction of democracy and legal system is improving everyday.
sentences.chinese: 我們的民主法制建設現在更是日新月異。

sentences.english: Wineries are changing and they no longer have room for dust nor for cobwebs.
sentences.chinese: 釀酒廠日新月異，它們不再有佈滿塵埃的房間了。

sentences.english: Now the world change quickly wih the science and technology of each passing day.
sentences.chinese: 今天，世界隨着日新月異的科技發生着迅速的變化。

sentences.english: With the development of communication technology, electric power communication is also developed rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 隨着通信技術的日新月異，電力通信也發展迅猛。

sentences.english: Today, the world is changing rapidly with the ever-changing technology.
sentences.chinese: 今天，世界隨着日新月異的科技發生着迅速的變化。

sentences.english: The change is so rapid that I can see big differences after just a few months.
sentences.chinese: 來穗幾個月，我就感覺到了她日新月異的變化。

sentences.english: The way the world's masses are using these tools is going to continually evolve over time.
sentences.chinese: 傳媒界使用這些工具的方法也是日新月異的。

sentences.english: Nowadays, the technology is undergoing great changes, and more and more new technologies are emerging.
sentences.chinese: 當今世界，技術變革日新月異，新興技術風起雲湧。
這真是一個日新月異的世界。

definition: (Tw) to draw on (others' experience)/to learn from (how others do things)/lesson to be learned (by observing others)
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
to increase steadily/to grow with each passing day
in an instant a myriad changes (idiom); rapid substantial change
railtrack connection/to integrate into sth/to dock/to connect/to be in step with/to bring into line with/to align
